body_html:
I have the same issue here. However I can reproduce this on CentOS server but not on my Ubuntu 16.04 pc.

I use Anaconda and package versions are listed below:
pytorch 0.3.1 py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.0.5_2
matplotlib 2.1.2
